solution_line_template: There are a total of {games_first_round}+{games_second_round}+{games_third_round}+{games_finals} = <<{games_first_round}+{games_second_round}+{games_third_round}+{games_finals}={total_games}>>{total_games} games of tennis in a typical tournament
If 1 game uses {cans_per_game} cans of tennis balls, then {total_games} games would use {total_games}*{cans_per_game} = {total_cans} cans of tennis balls
If 1 can of tennis balls has {balls_per_can} balls, then {total_cans} cans would have <<{total_cans}*{balls_per_can}={total_balls}>>{total_balls} balls
